titles.title: Launch Services Corporation Act of 1995
To establish a non-Federal, for-profit Launch Services Corporation for providing space launch service to the Federal Government and other domestic and foreign customers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Space and Aeronautics.

term.name: Advice and consent of the Senate

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Launch Services Corporation Act of 1995 - Authorizes the creation of a non-Federal, for profit Launch Services Corporation to provide space launch services to the Federal Government and other domestic and foreign customers. Ends Federal funding (except for payment of services) for the Corporation after the year 2001.
